resources.string: Already have an account? Go to the
Sign in to Continue. Remember, your password is yours, do not share it with anyone.
Enter an account or mobile number
The harder the password, the better and safer
Make sure that your PIN is unique and secure
Must contain both numbers, uppercase and lowercase letters
Must be at least 8 characters long
How to create a secure PIN:
How would you like to get verified?
Select one of the options below
What would you like to do today?
This loan is available to Equity members who have had their Equity bank account for at least six months
You can borrow up to 1,000,000 KES, while can be paid over a period of 12 months.
You can check your loan limit and find out
Equity offers a variety of loans to help you meet your goals. Look through our loan products to find one that is suited to your needs
Borrow up to 1,000,000 KES and pay back over up to twelve months
You can remove any of the devices connected to your profile
Reach out to us anytime you need help and our talent team will be gladly assist you
Your favourite contact will apear here. Add a new one to quickly transact
